note: The method behind this data have changed over time, with a major methodological change occurring in 2015. Be cautious comparing old and new data, especially data from before and after 2015.
title: Commodity-driven deforestation
subtitle: Estimated [tree cover loss](#dod:tree-cover-loss) from commodity-driven deforestation is typically large-scale deforestation linked primarily to commercial agricultural expansion.  This type of tree cover loss usually represents permanent deforestation.
